title: Business Center and Meeting Room, Controlled Gate Access, Microwaves
posting_body: ['4633 Campus Drive, Fort Worth, TX 76119', 'Campus Apartments brings you the best community amenities in the affordable apartment home industry.', 'Some of these include controlled gate access, a wonderful fitness center, and a helpful business center.', 'Cooling off in our shimmering swimming pool will feel great after a hard day’s work.', 'Be sure to sign up for a tour today and be one of the first to tour our brand new community.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Ceiling Fan(s)', 'Microwaves', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Energy Star Appliances & Lighting', 'Covered Patios or Balconies with Storage Closet', 'Water-conserving Fixtures', 'Community Features:', 'Business Center and Meeting Room', 'Common Area Wi-Fi', 'Clubroom with Serving Kitchen', 'Dog Park', "Children's Activity Room", 'Grill & Picnic Areas', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Income restrictions apply, pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
